title: Process a Group Ticket Sale
description: A company wants to buy a block of 50 tickets for a game for a corporate outing.

tasks.description: Check for the availability of a block of 50 seats together for the desired game.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent finds an available block of seats in a specific section.

tasks.description: Provide a quote for the group sale, including any applicable group discounts.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent generates a quote with a 10% group discount.

tasks.description: Process the sale and issue the block of tickets to the company representative.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent successfully completes the sale and delivers the tickets digitally.
